text: While we don’t know what the #Chloroquine or #hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) dose that some will use #offlabel for #COVID19, some sources have suggested a short course. While we wait for more studies, see @AAOjournal guidelines on HCQ to avoid #visionloss https://t.co/aEDllsVRS7 #eyes https://t.co/pdqptfnabW
